item.title: CVE-2023-27629|2024-08-02T12:16:36.442Z -- paul%20ryley -- site%20reviews
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Paul Ryley Site Reviews plugin <= 6.5.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29095|2024-06-04T17:57:23.186Z -- paul%20ryley -- site%20reviews
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paul Ryley Site Reviews allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Site Reviews: from n/a through 6.11.6.
